item.description:
"I loved the last one!  Had a great time....met so many really nice women and a few nice men! :)  I liked the DJ also....really fun...see you then!"   --- Jaye, current member 

 

Let's gather again and dance, dance, dance!


The last one was a blast and no doubt this one will be as well!

 

You're invited to meet your new sweetie at this 2012 Start the New Year Singles Dance Party on Saturday, January 28th!  

 

You can expect this dance to be very different than the others you've attended.  I have located a really nice space quip with a bartender for us.   There'll be delicious appetizers, a hard-wood dance floor, and fabulous music provided by The Musical Dynamo!  

 

 

There are 90 tickets to the Dance Party available so I encourage you to (a) consider if you are available to come, (b) think about who you would like to be there with you and (c) buy your ticket online here.   

 

I will be keeping track of gender balance as well.  You may find yourself temporarily on a wait-list if the balance is off...just so I can give it time to re-balance itself.
item.name: Start the New Year With a Singles Dance Party
